content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and another burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5) and two transport belts at positions(x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not in a NO_FUEL state.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not in a NO_INGREDIENTS state.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of steam engines to ensure they are not in a NOT_CONNECTED state.

### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of electricity groups to ensure they are not in a NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK state.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
